lounge.privacy_warning: ATTENTION: This is an ephemeral chat ("Ghost Mode"). No messages are saved in the database or server history. Messages are visible ONLY to currently online users and will be destroyed when closing the page or logging out.

section1.title: 1. Consent and Respect
section1.content: Consent is the cornerstone of Velvet Circle. Any interaction, be it digital (messages, cards) or physical (events, radar), must be based on the explicit consent of all parties involved. A "no" is final and does not admit replies. Lack of respect will lead to an immediate and permanent ban.

section2.title: 2. Prohibition of Recording
section2.content: It is strictly forbidden to take screenshots, video recordings, or any form of capture of others' content, especially within the Vault or private chats. Our community is built on trust; violating another member's privacy is considered the most serious crime within the Circle.

section3.title: 3. Honesty in Profiles
section3.content: We encourage sincerity. Using photos that do not belong to you or a deceptive identity harms the experience of other members. Verified profiles enjoy a higher reputation and more privileges (Trust Score).

section4.title: 4. Ghost Protocol (Discretion)
section4.content: Interactions that occur in the Lounge are ephemeral. What happens in the Circle stays in the Circle. It is forbidden to share information obtained privately outside the platform.

section1.title: The Contract with Velvet Circle
section1.content: By accessing Velvet Circle, you confirm that you are at least 18 years old (or the legal age in your country) and that you use the platform exclusively for recreational and consensual purposes among adults.

section2.title: Velvet Credits and VIP
section2.content: Credits are a virtual currency used to interact with the platform's services (tips, Vault unlocking, AI Companion). Payments are made through secure external processors (Ko-fi). VIP members enjoy advantages such as the Oracle and the Velvet Key, but remain subject to common rules of conduct.

section3.title: Radar Use
section3.content: The Radar function uses optional geolocation. Velvet Circle applies an automatic "Jitter" (blurring) to your position to protect your privacy, preventing the exact address from being visible to other members.

section1.title: Personal Data
section1.content: We only collect data necessary for your profile's operation: email, pseudonym, and content you upload to the Vault. Your emails are never sold or used for third-party marketing.

section2.title: Ephemeral Protocol (Chat)
section2.content: All private messages have an expiration time of 36 hours, after which they are deleted from our systems. Public chat ("The Club") is not saved in any database; messages exist only in the volatile memory of the current session.

section3.title: GDPR and Rights
section3.content: You can request full deletion of your account at any time. Deletion will instantly remove all your data, Vault content, and remaining credits.

confessional.title: The Confessional
confessional.desc: "Give words to your desire and you will make it real. Here anonymity is sacred."
confessional.empty: No secrets revealed yet. Be the first.
